ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Fishbone Earing advice...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I can answer this for the most part. 1) the spawn time on this NPC is 6 hours with no placeholders. 2) The earring is his rare drop. I ve happened upon him
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Adam Wasserman" <wassermana@...>
>
>I'm here for some advice. I don't want to spoil anyone's fun so I won't
>mention the name of the mob or the zone, I was just wondering if any of you
>have killed him firsthand. If so, what level would you recommend for
>soloing
>him or for a party killing him. Also, what faction hits do you take (if you
>remember)

I can answer this for the most part.

1) the spawn time on this NPC is 6 hours with no placeholders.

2) The earring is his rare drop. I've happened upon him 6 or 7 times, he's
never had it.

3) You take bad faction with the area (don't remember the factions offhand
but its the same as the factions you'd take for killing a guard in that
zone).

I can't remember now what level I was when he conned white to me, but it was
in my 20's somewhere. He is pretty easy for his level, but at least on our
server, its impossible to find him uncamped (and even when he appears
uncamped, if you hang around til he spawns you'll find a few druids and
wizards gate in just in time to kill him then gate out again).

Hope this helps!

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 50 Bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
